org.jnosql.diana.api.document

Interface DocumentQuery


  • public interface DocumentQuery
    Class that contains information to do a query to DocumentCollectionManager
    See Also:
    DocumentCollectionManager.find(DocumentQuery), DocumentCondition, Sort

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DocumentQuery addColumn(String document)
      Add column to be either retrieve or deleted, if empty will either returns all elements in a find query or delete all elements in a column family entity.
      DocumentQuery addSort(Sort sort)
      Add the order how the result will returned
      DocumentQuery and(DocumentCondition condition)
      Appends a new condition in the query using {DocumentCondition.and(DocumentCondition)}
      String getCollection()
      The document collection name
      Optional<DocumentCondition> getCondition()
      The conditions that contains in this DocumentQuery
      List<String> getDocuments()
      Get documents
      long getLimit()
      Returns the max number of row in a query
      List<Sort> getSorts()
      The sorts that contains in this DocumentQuery
      long getStart()
      Gets when the result starts
      static DocumentQuery of(String collection)
      Creates a DocumentQuery
      DocumentQuery or(DocumentCondition condition)
      Appends a new condition in the query using {DocumentCondition.or(DocumentCondition)}
      void setLimit(long limit)
      the limit setter
      void setStart(long start)
      Setter to start a query
      DocumentDeleteQuery toDeleteQuery()
      Converts to DocumentDeleteQuery
